      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>41348d61-3b80-4120-20ca-4beceed09922#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A hattusasi nagytemplom raktára, Kr.e. 13. század</string>
            <string language="en">The Store Room of the Big Church of Hattusasi .13 th Century  Bc.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Vorratsraum der grossen Kirche des Hattusasi 
13 Th Jahrhunderts Bc.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La salle de mémoire de la grande église du 
siècle de Th de 13 de Hattusasi bc.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O quarto de loja da igreja grande do século do th
do 13 de Hattusasi bc.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La stanza di deposito della chiesa grande del 
secolo del Th del 13 di Hattusasi bc.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το δωμάτιο καταστημάτων της μεγάλης εκκλησίας 13 του 
αιώνα θορίου Hattusasi π.Χ..</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cuarto de almacén de la iglesia grande del 
siglo del th del 13 de Hattusasi a.C..</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">templomraktár, benne a földbe ásott tárolóedényekkel</string>
            <string language="en">church warehouse, with the storage vessels digged into the ground</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Hattusas,  hettiták,  Kr.e. 13. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">Hattusas,  hettitas, 13th century BC,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kirchelager, mit den Speicherbehältern digged in den 
Boden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'entrepôt d'église, avec les navires de mémoire digged
dans le sol</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o armazém da igreja, com as embarcações do 
armazenamento digged na terra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il magazzino della chiesa, con i vasi di memoria digged in
terra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η αποθήκη εμπορευμάτων εκκλησιών, με τα σκάφη 
αποθήκευσης στο έδαφος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el almacén de la iglesia, con los recipientes del 
almacenaje digged en la tierra</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hattusas, hettitas, 13. Jahrhundert BC,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hattusas, hettitas, 13ème siècle BC,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hattusas, hettitas, 1ó século BC,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hattusas, hettitas, tredicesimo secolo BC,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hattusas, hettitas, 13$ος αιώνας Π.Χ.,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hattusas, hettitas, décimotercero siglo A.C.,</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
